title: Senegal boss Thiaw banned after Afcon final chaos
content: Senegal manager Pape Thiaw his banned for five games after the chaotic scenes during the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco.

title: Ex-Nigerian minister in bribery trial went on spending sprees, court hears
content: Prosecutors allege Diezani Alison-Madueke was given "a life of luxury" in the UK by people interested in Nigerian government contracts.

originalTitle: Sabalenka defeats Svitolina to reach Australian Open final
title: Sabalenka defeats Svitolina to reach Australian Open final
content: World No 1 Aryna Sabalenka is through to her fourth straight Australian Open final with victory against Elina Svitolina.

originalTitle: Why is India’s Nipah virus outbreak spooking the world?
title: Why is India’s Nipah virus outbreak spooking the world?
content: The virus spreads from animals to humans, via person-to-person contact or through consuming contaminated food.

title: ‘Wael’s last wish’: Man detained by ICE denied release for son’s funeral
content: Maher Tarabishi's ailing son Wael died as he sat in a detention facility. His family says ICE is responsible.
